page.title: 09A MILKMAN'S DAY
page.content: I get up in the morning at about 4.30 and get down to the dairy at 5.00.Here the milk is kept in a large refrigerator.I load the milk in crates onto an electric milk float.I also carry eggs,potatoes,orange juice and cream. I go out on my milk round delivering milk to the customers' houses.I call on about 550 houses.Their milk orders vary from 1 pint to 5 or 6 pints a day.The milk comes in glass bottles which are returnable. The majority of customers pay their bill weekly but some hotels and shops pay monthly.I usually finish my round by lunchtime but it takes me much longer on the day I collect the money.I work 7 days a week for 3 weeks then I have a week off. {John Forster}
